name: @switchboard-xyz/solana.js
description: API wrapper for integrating with the Switchboard V2 program on Solana

scripts.local:validator: solana-test-validator -q -r --ledger .anchor/test-ledger --mint $(solana-keygen pubkey ~/.config/solana/id.json) --bind-address 0.0.0.0 --url https://api.devnet.solana.com --rpc-port 8899  --clone 2TfB33aLaneQb5TNVwyDz3jSZXS6jdW2ARw1Dgf84XCG `# programId` --clone J4CArpsbrZqu1axqQ4AnrqREs3jwoyA1M5LMiQQmAzB9 `# programDataAddress` --clone CKwZcshn4XDvhaWVH9EXnk3iu19t6t5xP2Sy2pD6TRDp `# idlAddress` --clone BYM81n8HvTJuqZU1PmTVcwZ9G8uoji7FKM6EaPkwphPt `# programState` --clone FVLfR6C2ckZhbSwBzZY4CX7YBcddUSge5BNeGQv5eKhy `# switchboardVault`
scripts.generate:client: anchor idl fetch -o ./src/idl/mainnet.json SW1TCH7qEPTdLsDHRgPuMQjbQxKdH2aBStViMFnt64f --provider.cluster mainnet && anchor idl fetch -o ./src/idl/devnet.json 2TfB33aLaneQb5TNVwyDz3jSZXS6jdW2ARw1Dgf84XCG --provider.cluster devnet
scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.localnet:up: npm run local:validator & sleep 15 && npm run test:localnet; kill -9 $(pgrep command solana-test-validator) || exit 0
scripts.prepublishOnly: shx rm -rf lib && npm run build && npm version patch
